ExtensionManifest.Abstract:
Changelog delta since 0.3.5: Fixed assign animation bug. Fixed add animation function not crating the aniamtions and images directory if they don't exist yet.
Changelog delta since 0.3.4: Fixed bug with animation which have a space in the name.
Changelog delta since 0.3.3: Delete button in the slideContainer instead of a context-menu.
Changelog delta since 0.3.2: Added the Animation tab to the exension. User can add, update and delete animations. Renamed the "Nemo" tab to "Slides" Assigning aniamtions now actually works. Dynamically loading them when viewing in the browser as well!
Changelog delta since 0.3.1: Added Stay-Ghosting Added go to Comment Slide button to extension
